attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We feel adults should be allowed to watch uncensored sex on TV. We are adults we do not need these controls.
Modern Technology allows parent controls for viewing TV. It is against our human rights as adults to be told what we can and cannot watch on TV or at the cinema. There is nothing wrong with watching adult non censored films.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
